resources.string: Your heart rate is Low. Apart from being a highly trained athlete, a slow heart rate is usually caused by an underlying issue. Work with your doctor or another healthcare practitioner to find and treat the cause.

Your heart rate is Normal. A typical heart rate in this state is for adults is 60â€“100 bpm. You can prevent out of normal by doing the following: regular exercise, reducing stress, maintaining a healthy weight, and eating healthy.
Your heart rate is High. Take a walk outside, ideally in nature. Relaxation exercises such as controlled breathing, meditation. To prevent this condition, practice yoga and stretching.
Your heart rate is Low. You should adjust your training plan to be more effective. Work with your doctor or another healthcare practitioner to find and treat the cause.
Your heart rate is Normal. You can prevent out of normal by doing the following: regular exercise, reducing stress, maintaining a healthy weight, and eating healthy.
Your heart rate is High. It\'s advisable to should slow down or stop exercising and discuss it further with your physician or cardiologist. This may be a sign of serious illness.
